name: Monaki
description: Collection of beautiful NFT'S on Ton blockchain. Closed community for builders, NFT collectors and crypto enthusiasts. Project since in 2022 year. We have a Staking platform for farming our token MONK. Now we build marketplace, social network MonBeau and utilities for TON ecosystem. Token is a main our currency in our ecosystem: community marketplace, social network MonBeau, other tools and utilities, when we will build it. In November we will open also a Staking platform for our token too. Now we prepare our second NFT collection - t We have a strong community of Ton chain builders and develop of our project every day. Great team. Great future for Ton chain.
